name: Nicki Homaj
description:
Controls

Press SPACE to flip your hair and clear the passive-aggressive mansplaining! Don't let him overwhelm you with his comments! If the Blue Meter fills up, you're lost forever in an endless "discussion".

Alternate pressing between the LEFT AND RIGHT ARROWS to fill up the Pink Meter. Fill it up and win, walk away from that awful conversation!!

Originally created for the GAMERella Jam in 2014 (theme: Boss Up!), paired with custom controllers made of a wig and high heels.

Game by Kim Hoang, Kara Stone, Nicole Aouad, Maeve Levasseur, Cailleah Scott-Grimes.

Homage to this amazing Nicki Minaj video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PzGZamtlRP0
